Big rallies and demonstrations in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Peasants organizations including the "National Federation of Peasants Associations" staged rallies in different parts of South Korea on November 21 condemning the authorities' agricultural policy failure and demanding the settlement of peasant families' debts, according to Seoul-based radio no. 1.
 The participants occupied main motorways across South Korea before staging demonstrations demanding a cutdown in their debts.

articles.content:
New Nepalese ambassador presents his credentials to Kim Yong Nam 
    Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) - Rajeshwar Acharya, newly-appointed ambassador e.p. of the Kingdom of Nepal to the DPRK, presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today. 
 Present there was vice-minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Kil Yon.    
 After receiving credentials, Kim Yong Nam conversed with the ambassador.
